name: Format\ArticleThumbnail
description: The component for displaying a thumbnail image with an article link.

properties.name: accessibilityCaption
properties.description: A caption that describes the image. The text is used for VoiceOver for iOS and VoiceOver for macOS. If accessibilityCaption is not provided, the caption value is used instead.

properties.name: additions
properties.description: Ignored for all children of ArticleLink.

properties.name: anchor
properties.description: An object that defines vertical alignment with another component.

properties.name: animation
properties.description: An object that defines an animation to be applied to the component.

properties.name: aspectRatio
properties.description: The aspect ratio of the component in which the article thumbnail is displayed.

properties.name: behavior
properties.description: An object that defines behavior for a component, like Parallax or Springy.

properties.name: caption
properties.description: A caption that describes the image. The text is seen when the image is in full screen. This text is also used by VoiceOver for iOS and VoiceOver for macOS, if accessibilityCaption text is not provided. The caption text does not appear in the main article view. To display a caption in the main article view, use the Caption component.

properties.name: conditional
properties.description: An array of component properties that can be applied conditionally, and the conditions that cause them to be applied.

properties.name: explicitContent
properties.description: A Boolean that indicates that the image may contain explicit content.

properties.name: fillMode
properties.description: A string that indicates how to display the image fill.

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: A Boolean that indicates whether the component is hidden.

properties.name: horizontalAlignment
properties.description: A string that sets the horizontal alignment of the image fill within its component.

properties.name: identifier
properties.description: A unique identifier for this component. If used, the identifier must be unique across the entire document. An identifier is required if you want to anchor other components to this component. See Anchor.

properties.name: layout
properties.description: An inline ComponentLayout object that contains layout information, or a string reference to a ComponentLayout object that is defined at the top level of the document.

properties.name: style
properties.description: An inline ComponentStyle object that defines the appearance of this component, or a string reference to a ComponentStyle object that is defined at the top level of the document.

properties.name: URL
properties.description: The URL of an image file.

properties.name: verticalAlignment
properties.description: A string that defines the vertical alignment of the article thumbnail within the component.
